sentences.en: He believed that his present superiority guaranteed his future victory.
sentences.cn: 他相信现在的优越可以保障将来的胜利.

sentences.en: He contented himself by assuming an air of superiority.
sentences.cn: 他表现出一副高高在上的样子以获得自我满足。

sentences.en: He had a well-developed sense of his own superiority.
He laughed with his odd mixture of superiority and shyness.
sentences.cn: 他带着一种优越感和羞涩掺合在一起的奇怪神情笑了起来.

sentences.en: His air of calm superiority annoyed her intensely.
sentences.cn: 他不动声色的优越感让她极其烦恼.

sentences.en: It required superiority -- kindly superiority -- to move her -- the superiority of a genius like Ames.
sentences.cn: 要想打动她,得有高人一等的优势 -- 善意的优势-—像艾姆斯那样的天才的优势.

sentences.en: Janet always spoke with an air of superiority.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特说话时总显得盛气凌人。

sentences.en: On foot his raised head and half - dropped eyelids too palpably assumed superiority.
sentences.cn: 走路时,他高昂的头和半闭的眼睛极其明显地表现出超人一等的优越.

sentences.en: She is fond of flaunting her superiority before her friends and schoolmates.
sentences.cn: 她好在朋友和同学面前逞强.

sentences.en: The German tank superiority existed only in quality and organization.
sentences.cn: 德军坦克只不过在性能和编制方面占优势.

sentences.en: The home side rubbed in their superiority with a further goal.
sentences.cn: 主队再进一球从而奠定了优势。

sentences.en: the intellectual superiority of humans over other animals
sentences.cn: 人类相比其他动物所具有的智力优势

sentences.en: the superiority of this operating system
sentences.cn: 这种操作系统的优越性

sentences.en: The technical superiority of laser discs over tape is well established.
sentences.cn: 激光影碟相对于磁带的技术优势早已牢牢确立。

sentences.en: They realized it would be suicidal to resist in the face of overwhelming military superiority.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到面对力量相差如此悬殊的军队，抵抗无异于自取灭亡。

sentences.en: We believe in the superiority of this method over that one.
sentences.cn: 我们相信这种方法比那种方法优越.

words.tran_cn: 上级的；优秀的，出众的；高傲的
上级，长官；优胜者，高手；长者

phrases.tran_cn: 空中优势；空优战斗机；空优
优越感；自尊情结；过于自尊

trans.tran_en: the quality of being better, more skilful, more powerful etc than other people or things
